amendment.description: To authorize the Secretary to enter into deep draft port development partnerships.

vote.text: Amendment SA 903 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 903 proposed by Senator Vitter for Senator Murkowski. (consideration: CR S3401-3408) To authorize the Secretary to enter into deep draft port development partnerships.
